MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the G66 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5:30pm. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:20pm on 20th January 2021.
